snippet: White Sox pitcher Jose Quintana was hit in the shin by a line drive Saturday and removed from Chicago's 6-4 loss to an Arizona Diamondbacks split squad after just two batters....

headline.print_headline: White Sox LHP Quintana Hit in Shin by Line Drive
headline.main: White Sox LHP Quintana Hit in Shin by Line Drive

lead_paragraph: White Sox pitcher Jose Quintana was hit in the shin by a line drive Saturday and removed from Chicago's 6-4 loss to an Arizona Diamondbacks split squad after just two batters.
